decision.strategy: Always enter trades based on RSI position relative to 50. If RSI is above 50, enter a SHORT position. If RSI is below 50, enter a LONG position. This ensures we always have a trading signal. Use the 15m timeframe for entries. For position management: hold positions for at least 5 minutes, then exit on any 2-point RSI move in the opposite direction of the trade.
decision.risk_guidelines: Max position size 5% of capital. Max leverage 10x. Stop trading after 3 losses in a day or 5% daily drawdown.
decision.additional_context: I prefer catching big moves over frequent small trades. The account typically holds 1-3 positions at a time.
